text: Stefano Belisari is better known by his stage name Elio. He was born in 1961. He is an Italian singer from Milan. He founded the comedy rock band Elio e le storie tese in 1980. He usually sings but he can play transverse flute, electric guitar and bass. He is the father of a couple of twins. Category:1961 births Category:People from Milan Category:Italian songwriters Category:Italian singers Category:Living people
title: Elio (singer)
